data.comment: The big names in today's match at Lotto Park have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Brussels.
In the minute 1, Anderlecht to take a throw-in in St. Truidense territory.
Lawrence Visser signals a St. Truidense throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
St. Truidense's Keito Nakamura gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Throw-in for Anderlecht close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to St. Truidense.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to Anderlecht in their own half.
Adrien Trebel (Anderlecht) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 9, Anderlecht have been awarded a corner by Lawrence Visser.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of St. Truidense.
St. Truidense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lawrence Visser signals a throw-in for Anderlecht, close to St. Truidense's area.
Ball safe as St. Truidense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Can St. Truidense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
Lawrence Visser signals a St. Truidense throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
Can St. Truidense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
In the minute 13, Lawrence Visser awards Anderlecht a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Anderlecht in their own half.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
St. Truidense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Anderlecht to take a throw-in in St. Truidense territory.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of St. Truidense.
In the minute 19, Free kick Anderlecht.
Anderlecht drives forward and Jeremy Doku gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
St. Truidense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 21, Anderlecht pushes forward through Jeremy Doku, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in St. Truidense.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to Anderlecht.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a St. Truidense goal kick.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of St. Truidense.
St. Truidense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, St. Truidense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for St. Truidense in their own half.
In Brussels a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, Lawrence Visser awards the away team a throw-in.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to St. Truidense.
Lawrence Visser blows against St. Truidense's Chris Durkin for offside.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Anderlecht in their own half.
St. Truidense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of St. Truidense.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick St. Truidense.
Can St. Truidense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
Throw-in for Anderlecht in the half of St. Truidense.
Nany Dimata of Anderlecht is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 35, Lawrence Visser signals a Anderlecht throw-in in St. Truidense's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
Throw-in St. Truidense.
In the minute 37, Throw-in high up the field for Anderlecht in Brussels.
Lawrence Visser awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Anderlecht is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Bogdan Mykhaylichenko is on target to give Anderlecht a 1-0 advantage.
Anderlecht to take a throw-in in St. Truidense territory.
St. Truidense have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Michel Vlap for Anderlecht gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Lawrence Visser awards St. Truidense a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Lotto Park.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Can Anderlecht get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St. Truidense's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Anderlecht close to the penalty box.
In the minute 50, Ibrahima Sory Sankhon (St. Truidense) has been shown a straight red card by referee Lawrence Visser.
Goal! Nany Dimata extends Anderlecht's lead to 2-0 in Brussels with a header.
Adrien Trebel instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 51, In Brussels a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to St. Truidense.
Peter Zulj is booked for the home team.
In the minute 53, Anderlecht needs to be cautious. St. Truidense have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for St. Truidense in the half of Anderlecht.
Anderlecht's Nany Dimata is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Anderlecht in the half of St. Truidense.
Lawrence Visser signals a Anderlecht throw-in in St. Truidense's half.
Buatu is replacing Keito Nakamura for the away team.
In the minute 57, Play has been interrupted briefly in Brussels to check on Michel Vlap, who is grimacing with pain.
Anderlecht's Michel Vlap looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
In the minute 59, Anderlecht are coming forward and Adrien Trebel gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for St. Truidense at Lotto Park.
Steve De Ridder is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 60, Anderlecht to take a throw-in in St. Truidense territory.
Steve De Ridder for St. Truidense is back on the field again.
Steve De Ridder (St. Truidense) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Samuel Asamoah.
In the minute 61, St. Truidense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
Nany Dimata (Anderlecht) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
The home team has substituted Michel Vlap with Percy Tau. Frank Vercauteren is thus making his first change.
In the minute 65, Free kick for St. Truidense in their own half.
St. Truidense have a goal kick.
Ball safe as St. Truidense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 67, Anderlecht awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderlecht are pushing forward but Nany Dimata's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a St. Truidense goal kick.
In the minute 71, Anderlecht's Percy Tau has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brussels.
Nelson Balongo is replacing Yuma Suzuki for St. Truidense at Lotto Park.
In the minute 73, Anderlecht to take a throw-in in St. Truidense territory.
Can Anderlecht capitalize from this throw-in deep inside St. Truidense's half?
Free kick for St. Truidense in their own half.
In the minute 74, Frank Vercauteren (Anderlecht) is making a second substitution, with Antoine Colassin replacing Nany Dimata.
Free kick Anderlecht.
In Brussels, Peter Zulj (Anderlecht) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a St. Truidense goal kick.
St. Truidense awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Bogdan Mykhaylichenko with Edo Kayembe. This is the third substitution made today by Frank Vercauteren.
In the minute 81, Can St. Truidense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Anderlecht's half?
Lawrence Visser signals a free kick to St. Truidense in their own half.
Throw-in for St. Truidense in the half of Anderlecht.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Anderlecht.
In Brussels St. Truidense attack through Samuel Asamoah. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Anderlecht at Lotto Park.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for St. Truidense in their own half.
Free kick for St. Truidense in their own half.
St. Truidense are back in the match in Brussels. Nelson Balongo has scored to make it 2-1.
In the minute 88, Great play from Ko Matsubara to set up the goal.
Lawrence Visser signals a St. Truidense throw-in in Anderlecht's half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for St. Truidense at Lotto Park.
Throw-in St. Truidense.
The match is over. Final score 3-1.
Goal! Anderlecht extend their lead to 3-1 through Percy Tau.
Elias Cobbaut with an assist there.
